msgs.text: What are some unpopular opinions in the Bitcoin Space?

Have you guys heard Mechanic's take on Bitcoin. That the path to success is for the government to make Bitcoin illegal thus making self custody the ONLY option. Fuck ETFs fuck fake Bitcoin fuck pro Bitcoin politicians and Bitcoin legislation. This is the only way for true decentralization

"Bitcoin is and that is enough" by Beautyon. That we shouldn't be pitching that "Bitcoin is money" and instead should just call it a database (which it is). After the government legally recognizes Bitcoin as simply a database, then we can call it money or whatever we want.
